While every effort has been made to ensure accuracy and provide a well-rounded article, please note that individual experiences with companies can vary. This article is only intended to be a tool to help readers find a property management company or rental property. As such, it should not be the sole factor in any decision-making process.

Good

When it comes to positive aspects in the user reviews for Lakeway Rentals, instances of satisfaction seem to be in the minority. A few users noted that occasionally, maintenance issues were dealt with in a timely manner, and there were some interactions where the staff provided helpful customer service. Some users also mentioned that their security deposit was returned with reasonable deductions.

Another recurring theme within the positive reviews, though sparse, was the company’s efforts to address concerns when problems were escalated. Reports of a quick turnaround for some repair requests imply that, while inconsistent, Lakeway Rentals has the capacity to meet tenant expectations under specific circumstances.

Great

Amidst the critical feedback, some reviewers described instances of Lakeway Rentals going above and beyond with their service. Despite the challenges that many tenants faced, the reviews highlight the exceptional moments when the staff was attentive and responsive, pointing out that there is recognition of efforts to renew their reputation within the community. This has made some individuals feel confident the company is making strides to enhance their operational standards.

Few reviews also commend individual staff members who showed a professional and kind demeanor during interactions. A select few praised the company for their ability to handle inquiries professionally and offer an element of personalized care, suggesting that despite prevailing opinions, Lakeway Rentals has demonstrated potential to deliver quality service. These cases, while not representing the majority, indicate that experiences can vary, and some tenants have had favorable engagements with the company.

Bad

Several reviews indicate a pattern of poor customer service, with complaints about unprofessional conduct from the company's staff. Tenants have reported rude interactions, including instances of being ignored or dismissed when raising issues to the company’s attention. The communication from Lakeway Rentals seems to be a mix of delay and negligence, often leaving tenants frustrated and without timely resolution to their maintenance concerns, as seen in the accounts of users who experienced prolonged unavailability of essential services like heating and working appliances.

Another common complaint among the bad reviews pertains to the conditions of the rental properties themselves. Users have experienced cleanliness issues and pest infestations from the onset of their rental agreements, which speaks to possible oversight or neglect in property upkeep and preparation for new tenants. The grievances extend to what appears to be a lackadaisical attitude towards upkeep and timeliness in addressing evidently significant problems, reflecting a broader issue of maintenance management.

Ugly

Quite regrettably, the ugly side of the user reviews for Lakeway Rentals paints a rather distressing picture. Accusations of the company being 'slumlords' permeate through several accounts, where severe negligence has led to dangerous living conditions, such as structures with black mold, water leaks, and outright violations of health and safety standards. Tenants recount harrowing experiences of their homes being practically uninhabitable and the management's apparent indifference to these serious hazards.

Further exacerbating the negativity are reviews alleging manipulative and deceitful practices regarding security deposits and financial transactions. Tenants have accused Lakeway Rentals of unfair deposit deductions, unfounded charges, and even fraudulent behavior. It is specifically concerning to note the frequency and consistency in reports of Lakeway Rentals not returning security deposits or charging exorbitant fees for normal wear and tear, issues that existed prior to tenancy, or repairs that are the responsibility of the property management company. These negative experiences greatly tarnish the reputation of Lakeway Rentals and highlight the need for serious internal review and potential overhaul of their business practices.
